item.dc:creator: DanTanDaMan
item.content:encoded: I'm alive, sorry to tell ya all

item.dc:creator: DanTanDaMan
item.content:encoded:
I've begun to question myself for the past two week, a rather annoying thing to do.  I like to think of myself as a fair guy to everyone in general, but the thought has been rolling in my head for the past week.  So... the story that started it all...

First off, I got a bike for the summer, all interns here are refunded up to $300 for the bike, helmet, & lock combo.  So I bought one when I came and I had problems with it.  I rented a car for a day and went to complain to the store of the breaks/gears weren't acting that good and the bike was "brand new".  So I took it, and the guy said he'd take a look and fix it.  Got bored while waiting so I was observing the other customers.  I saw two asian girls getting bikes, a couple looking for a bike for a kid, and some dude waiting at the counter to pay for a helmet.  The asian girls stood out more cause they were closer to my age, and hey! I'm a guy, girls are more fun to watch . 

One of them had their a Microsoft ID badge and then the fact they were buying bikes made my head go, ohhhh more Microsoft interns! Mean to go up and chat and waste time, but I utterly failed at doing so, (boooo shy guy I am), so I just looked around the store listening in.  I heard them ask about bus route and I pretty randomly, out nowhere asked them where they were staying at and upon discovering they were near my place, I then offered them a ride, if the bikes fit in the car I had.  (I think I was slightly influenced that day by the fact I had given other interns nearby me a ride to the grocery store earlier).  So, I got my bike fixed, threw it in my rental car and the girls and I started putting their bikes in the car when something struck me.  I turned to them and went "Oh yea, my name is David or Dan Tan, so now you know my name so you aren't getting in the car with a stranger" .  Ok, that ends the funny note, but ever since then, I've been questioning myself. 

Would I have done such a thing for them if...
a) they weren't asian,
b) they weren't girls,
c) one was a guy, the other a girl,
d) they hadn't lived near me,
e) if they had been wearing clothing from a university or so, lets say one I didn't hear of before.
f) any various random factors

Lots of fun things, and I'm beating myself up wondering.  Why did I even do that? I'm not the kind of person who uhh... picks up girls at random areas nor have I ever done such a thing...

wp:comment.wp:comment_content:
good questions hard to answer.
all in all I am thinking you are growing more mature and you are changing.
keep asking the good questions and keep God central and you will make it through no sweat!
congratulations - we're all silently cheering you on XD

LOL funny/cheezy pick up line! What was their reponse?

Anyhow, good questions!

So are you gonna have a gf the next time I visit?

item.title: Continuing on...
item.dc:creator: DanTanDaMan
item.content:encoded:
continuing on the last topic, it can be argued that choosing to reject the super power because of the cons, opens up the discussion of making sacrifices for the general good of the population.  This brings in one of the older discussions of what's more important?

You're driving a car and you can't stop, you have to take one of two paths, one path has a group of 5 elderly people which you'll hit and most likely kill, on the other side you have a mother and her child.  What's more important? 5 lives vs. 2? People who don't have long to live vs. those whose lives are just starting?  Let's make things even more annoying.  Lets say you know one group and you don't know the other group? 

A manga series I read for kids awhile back (Hunter X Hunter) had a test for applicants.  Exam of Two Choices it was called.  The test applicant was asked "Your two children are being threatened, which do you save? a) Your son, b) your daughter?"  The solution that was given was "no answer at all" or silence.  Simply because there is not real answer, but the object of the exam was not to search for a right/wrong answer, but to realize that one day such a scenario may come.

These types of questions can be argued either way, but the only real solution I've found to date is that no matter which choice you pick, remember, you gotta live with your decision.  Either way you will be criticized by some, praised by others.  Sorta like politics .

ok I think I'll stop there, on another note, I'll be posting a few more of these around, but then the next set I'm going to limit who can see just cause no need to spook random people who see it.  If you want in msg me please, hopefully some of you people are interested.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: In the end it will all just be a gut reaction ...
kill the ones you know *jiggly hint* !! get them outta the way lolz jk jk ........... props! i'm back on xanga!

item.title: Anyone wish to join?
item.dc:creator: DanTanDaMan
item.content:encoded:
I'm oddly feeling philosophical this break (even though break has only started about 48-72 hours ago).  Maybe just a bunch of things have gone in life, maybe I'm feeling my years, *shrug*.  A good majority of my random bursts are going to be pretty silly things, a few might be deep.  I'm not really sure why I feel like it, I guess I'm curious to see if I'm just plain weird at with my thought process or if its just normal.

First discussion, lots of TV series and books all carry the same theme.  The person in particular has a super power.  I'm not sure about the rest of you, but I often evaluate a bunch of things with pros and cons.

I've always loved this quote in general "With great power comes great responsibility".

Pros: It'd be cool, it might come in useful for making a difference in someone's life, it might be useful and lead to some discover which would further the human race

Cons: Having a power would be so tempting to abuse just once, we're all only human.  that alone is reason why I wouldn't want such a power.  Other cons, you can easily get wrapped up with what if's "what if I had been there? I could've saved him/her".  and watching all those shows of superman, batman, etc. etc.  There's like a human nature that says "no one can be perfect, he/she must be up to something" which causes rumors to circulate which some people just gobble up.

meh, that was a weird start anyone wanna join in my mini-discussions? :)

item.title: oh boy...
item.dc:creator: DanTanDaMan
item.content:encoded:
its now midnight over here and what am I doing?  Procrastinating studying currently.  Bad... very bad thing... especially since I'm unsure how I'm going to study for my finals as is.  My final schedule

Monday: 8am-11am CHINESE (this is gonna be annoying no matter what)
Monday: 7pm-10pm CS 257 (this is a MATH course in the CS dept... and its open book... I'm afraid now...)
Tuesday: 8am-11am CS 241 (I have NO idea where I'm going to find the time to study unless I pull an all-nighter)

Thursday: 7pm-10pm CS 273 (the one final I be very well prepared for, the only catch is the stress of the first 3 is gonna be there...)

oh boy... this looks bad...  Anyone who reads this post I'd love some prayer for a calm and peaceful mind.  I'll admit I got a few screws lose currently as demonstrated by how I actually got angry last week and displayed it.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: lolzzz got angry and displayed it, dan.... way toooo strange i can't even imagine it lol but me will keep you in prayer. oh and by the way my link and jiggly are stronger so be ready!! lol

first up apoligies to ppl about my previous post, its just really annoying since i just do the bare minimum often to go and do a whole extra essay for no reason

if u dunno wut i talking about u should read about me more often ^_^

today was ....interesting

video editting we watched, get this, POWER RANGERS!!!!!!! to see how video effects of zoom,camera angle, smoke, and such are used even in kid shows, and dang so many things happening and i never knew it

chem was boring and funny combo as usual, the prof is a pretty good teacher with good examples and stories and such, but some of the things r too boring for even him to make interesting

math was its usual (take a guess what that means)

and finally my last class of the day, ENG 100, de result, TEACHER WASN'T THERE!! so the 4 of us that came left after 10 mins ^_^ unfortunately right b4 making this post i got an e-mail from her yelling at all of us for not reading each and every line of her e-mail, so like the class was in 1 room with no teacher with the teacher in another, but she didn't yell at us that much since the entire class of us did it

anime dlingis going great here, i've filled up 90 gigs already o_O

for High school i knew like more whites than azns, here its like 1 white de rest azn :) funny how some things work ja?

item.dc:creator: DanTanDaMan
item.content:encoded:
man... first day of classes sucked ass.  i woke up early at 6:30-7ish, walked de 30 mins to class get there barely in time just to find out IT FU*KING GOT CANCELED!!!!!!!!! so i look at my schedule again and my next class is at 2 PM!!!!!!!! so i could have slep for another 5 hours but noooo they couldn't put up notices or such... at least i found another frosh who had de same thing only different class

so i decided to try de bus system back.  i jump on 1 bus, after 5 mins it comes back to de same area.  so i jump off and wait 15 mins for a different bus.  i jump that bus and as it approaches my dorm i see the first bus, apparently de first bus luvs loops n makes loops all over campus grrrr...

so i power nap for 2 hours.  at least i managed to dl HxH OVA 3 GI: 11-12 during that time ^_^

wake up go to lunch and it sucks ass, i walk out hungrier than i walked in.  i go to math 243 and its filled w/ like 20 juniors and older, so i'm going oh crap i must have de wrong class... apparently its the right class and de teacher luvs giving tests and quizzes wayyyyy tooo much.

i run to de next class which is RHET105 which is none other than WRITING COMPOSITION!!!!!!!!!!!!AHHHH!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! the teacher is trying to be funny in a really really bad way...

i come back n play games n watch anime n i'm happy again ^_^ bye bye peeps

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: juniors and older... calc II/III, i'm guessing? writing comp with bad humor, how nice. college life sounds like fun.

item.dc:creator: DanTanDaMan
item.content:encoded:
okay all u seniors who graduated, or if u know a senior high schooler who graduated u can give this to em also

i e-mailed this out about a week ago but i really missed handing this off to a lot of ppl, so here it is for every1 else

To each and every senior i see
I give to thee
A poem complied by me

The Year has come to an end
The future is around the bend

It is time for us to go
Whether it be high or low

We should fly like a Kite
Up to the highest height
Upon our own might

Class of 04' you use to be
Class of 08' I now see

Congrats, I must say
For it is a happy day

A request if i may
To each person searching for their own way

Follow your heart, that's the key
Follow it just like me

by D Tan
The sleeping man

note: i modified it a bit cause i didn't like how it flowed so this of this as version 2

item.dc:creator: DanTanDaMan
item.content:encoded:
i guess i should put up a post about now, i doubt any1 cares to let me know if they like my site or not... :( anyway i took college tests...chem they let me go up a lvl, freaky since i had it 2 years ago n i was average in it...foreign languages...they told me i'm a dam idiot who shouldn't be doing languages n sent me to lvl 1 time for a new foreign language ^_^

grad this week, finally 3 more days n i'm getting de hell on outer this stupid school, n i won't look back like other peeps, seriously i spent 4 years there but i hated most of the teachers, most of the building smelled funny, paint chipping, leaky ceilings they never seem to fix all 4 years, expensive lunches (like they cut the lunch in half this year for the same price), stupid guidance consulers (sp?) who kept trying to send me to retarded classes, nice internet connection but they kept kicking us off the comps n banned gaming n watching movies got u evil looks, some stupid assignments (writing papers in math n losing points cause u suck in writing...seriously!), druggies guarenteed to be in at least 1 bathroom each period smoking or doing drugs, tinyass lockers (try about 6" wide by 3-4 ft. tall), overrated textbooks (charging us to pay for new books when they gave us the copies that were held together w/ tape n a crapload of glue, pages ripped, writing, did i mention like 10-20 years old?), making us read retarded books for english (ohhh all those weird topics ex. i hate those stupid romantic writers!), making a few finals that even the course teachers fail em(seriously happened for USH 1A 2 years ago some old guy wrote it n the teacher got a 60 on it), i think that's most of the bad things.

the few good things n wut i did about em:
friends, still see em, chat w/ em, talk to a few of em on the phone O_o
some awesome teachers that sang good music, i bought their CDs cause the teachers were that awesome
they had an anime club, i watch anime! wut other way to remember de club by?
chess club (this should be under bad but chess is fun), well we had a chess coach who couldn't beat ANYONE in the club n barely knew the pieces n how they move, i play chess w/ the peeps online
woodshop, nice place, they let me use like $100-150 worth of wood to make a bigass oak table, the results of my work r hanging about, a table or 2 that look really nice
sleeping & playing chess in class n the teachers don't care, well most of em 2 of em actually wrote me up for sleeping, de kid snoozes n fails its his own fault damit! i still snooze n i still play chess

last of all, my fav teacher, Mr. Canzanese, first ever english teacher who made me actually luv english, freaky ja? his writing tips actually help, now i might even write a sensible paper ^_^, Mr. Canz may u live on to pass your humor and excellent helpful hints page to other students

Reasons i luv school:7
Reasons i hate school: too many to count

Edit: i mean Cherry Hill East High School btw, not school in general

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: what's wrong with my gf yesterday?!
nice rant.
Hey thanks for letting me borrow the anime. You'll get it back tomorrow.That is if I see your sister. Anyways thanks aganin.
*point* point* thats foh beeenin mean to me... j/k.. o yeah ur not that scary hehehe... just palyin much.. i wont run or scream if u hug me.. hehe .. fds r find ar!!

id agree with everything u said except Canz.
The guy really cant teach that well anymore. that "a" level course we took was more of an "m". its sad how i did 1 essay all year and passed with a b. the books we read were for fun and the tests were so ez you could shot ur self in the head and the blood that lands on ur scantron would proll get u a b. this year in english was a serious waste with no new knowledge or skill gain.

item.dc:creator: DanTanDaMan
item.content:encoded:
okay finally info, i went to prom thurs, i started getting rdy only 45 mins b4 it cause i HATE DRESSING UP! anyway my date was stunning, i just felt like a umm... something really ugly... escorting de beautiful girl.

(oh yeah if u know who my date is don't spoil de fun for others n leave her name if u do so i'll ban u! ^_^)

anyway it was really funny since both of us hate making decisions so we just kept walking around de aquirium like 5 times or so.  yes we actually danced, mainly slow songs i can't dance fast songs i kept breaking out of laughter whenever i tried, although my date could do so nicely.   we also kept playing "hide from the cameraman" who was recording the whole time.  i ran into Psycho Soble n Java Josh there, they really matched it was freaky, Java Josh w/ a tux way too big for him n Psycho Sobel w/ this weirdass dress...Ivan & Steph looked nice together although it took me awhile to reconize steph w/ her hair up ^_^.  I saw bro-jo chained about often, Yuri came w/ Lauren, Mike w/ Ru, Q w/ some girl... i forget her name.  I also saw Sedkov being dragged about all night .  I saw lots of others but hey they don't read my xanga .

oh yeah pics, if u wanna em u gotta click here for em HERE

n send me an e-mail! O_o, so i know whose actually reading my site

oh yeah... college tests tomorrow...wut a way to finish up prom weekend... seriously sucks

item.dc:creator: DanTanDaMan
item.content:encoded:
yup that prediction of mine was right... :( i got dragged into house cleaning, bush cutting, n lots of other chores on my SENIOR CUT DAY! oh so wrong :(

Sat comes around with a family thingee plus getting blamed for the comp breaking down WHY ME? WHY?! although after i went to spend time w/ some senior kids from church, the plan was to go to Dave & Busters, but due to the family thing i got there 1.5 hours late... that's really overdoing azn norm ppl...so Dave & Busters was in its 21 n over drinking party time, although i could have sworn i saw some ppl from my school there *cough* *Dumas* , so we ended up at a crappy game area :( plus it was freaking expensive.  Vince got me up till 5:30AM playing cards, really not that late for me, but its amazing when other ppl stay up as late as me

Sunday comes around i fell asleep really early, like 8ish early *gasp* amazing ah? i only had 4 hours de night b4 n i didn't snooze all day.  so i didn't do anything again.. :(

Monday, aka today for u dummies, i did some gaming, watched another 3 epds of NOIR, maybe i can finish it this week u never know, put another 2 hours on FF9, still on the 3rd disc :(, n i posted all this lovely info about my life for u ppl.

on another note, Thurs=prom=tux=i hate dressing up, i should see if i can wear my tux sometime

Fri=day after prom=who cares if there r seniors in school=i wanna stay home pops!

Sun=visit U of I at UC=freshman oritentation=placement tests=damit!

week after finals i think....

week after that grad...finally! cya u crappy High school!

day after i disappear w/ the summer season

really long post haven't written this much for about 4 months i think...FYI, IF U READ THIS WHOLE ENTIRE POST I'M TOUCHED BUT U NEED SOMETHING TO DO!

item.dc:creator: DanTanDaMan
item.content:encoded:
me went to great adventure today

item.dc:creator: DanTanDaMan
item.content:encoded:
i'm talking to steph online n we get into the discussion of anime, she says she was gonna study even though its senior year n its almost done, instead of watching anime...so i asked her:

Shouji King: which do u choose?
Shouji King: studying for tests which at most will affect your grades by like 5 points max
Shouji King: or watching anime?
argenteus wolf: which anime?
argenteus wolf: well
Shouji King: whichever anime u got?
argenteus wolf: usually the studying
Shouji King: !!!
Shouji King: would it be torture for some1 to tie u a chair forcing u to watch anime which your textbooks r next to u?!
argenteus wolf: sort of.............i mean, i'd enjoy the anime.............but i'd feel guilty about not studying
Shouji King: *sigh*

wut is becoming of dis whacky world?!

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: i plan to study next year haha...

so i'm lazy so sue me
wells u seniors.. poor juniors ... u ppls could b lazi but i cant i hav to b hardworkin ..o else i dont get nothin ..hehe ... laterz ..takecare

oh yeah... i found out yesterday Physics AP test is monday... IF YOU'RE SCREWED N YOU KNOW IT CLAP YOUR HANDS!! *CLAP* *CLAP*!... IF YOU'RE SCREWED N YOU KNOW IT CLAP YOUR HANDS!! *CLAP* *CLAP*!... IF YOU'RE REALLY REALLY SCREWED N YOU REALLY REALLY KNOW IT CLAP YOUR HANDS!! *CLAP* *CLAP*!

oh yeah found out today my research paper is due on wednesday

ANOTHER ROUND!

IF YOU'RE SCREWED N YOU KNOW IT CLAP YOUR HANDS!! *CLAP* *CLAP*!... IF YOU'RE SCREWED N YOU KNOW IT CLAP YOUR HANDS!! *CLAP* *CLAP*!... IF YOU'RE REALLY REALLY SCREWED N YOU REALLY REALLY KNOW IT CLAP YOUR HANDS!! *CLAP* *CLAP*!

item.dc:creator: DanTanDaMan
item.content:encoded:
oh yeah 1 AP test down 2 to go...i'm suppose to at 2 down 1 to go, but the stupid ppl mixed me up w/ the deca group... so i went to school yesterday n left it in under 30 mins cause i had nothing, nada, w/ me other than clothes, shoes, glasses, n pencils..

calc AP was murder, i left over a third of em blank... most of which were in the calculator section, i just use a calculator for the basic 4 functions, trig functions, n log functions.  i'm sitting there trying to figure out how to use the fnInt function n crap...

physics is evil! i shall attempt to get a 3 on half of the test...its next week, 1 week to prepare b4 i die... :(

n then a week after that i make up the COmputer Science AP exam...

then a week after that i take 2 college placement tests...

then 2 weeks after that i graduate... y is the end of year so BUSY?! *sniff*

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: yo man, what the heck? you really did mess up in AP Cal today? i know you didn't!!! lol, it's pretty hard though
oh i goccha, TI 83 Plus right?? lol

item.dc:creator: DanTanDaMan
item.content:encoded:
AP tests r almost here!!!!!!!!!! ahhhh!!!! *runs around in circles* *jumps up n down* *finally gives up n jumps off.... um.... something that will injure u and might break an arm... specifically the writing arm *  

on other news here's a conv i had dis weekend, i luv the logic from it, and the weather we were talking about was the one on sunday w/ all that loud thunder n such

21:07 04/23/2004 Shouji King: weekend looks bad...
21:07 04/23/2004 argenteus wolf: so does the weather
21:07 04/23/2004 Shouji King: shit!
21:07 04/23/2004 Shouji King: i heard that also...
21:07 04/23/2004 Shouji King: pardon de curse
21:09 04/23/2004 argenteus wolf: heh
21:09 04/23/2004 argenteus wolf: no problem
21:09 04/23/2004 argenteus wolf: i hope my surge protector works
21:10 04/23/2004 Shouji King: same...
21:10 04/23/2004 Shouji King: worse for me since i'm gaming
21:10 04/23/2004 Shouji King: power goes out
21:10 04/23/2004 Shouji King: game goes down
21:10 04/23/2004 Shouji King: i most likely die on it :P
21:12 04/23/2004 argenteus wolf: yea, i shut off my school work
21:12 04/23/2004 argenteus wolf: i guess i'll watch some anime
21:12 04/23/2004 Shouji King: :)
21:12 04/23/2004 Shouji King: i luv that logic
21:12 04/23/2004 Shouji King: bad weather too dangerous to do hw
21:12 04/23/2004 Shouji King: must watch anime n manga instead!
21:12 04/23/2004 Shouji King: w00t w00t :)

the morrow (sp?) of this story is when there is bad weather with power flickering, save your hw and start watching anime n reading manga!!! w00t w00t!!!

if only i could without AP tests...i'm hitting about 4's on just multiple choice...so that means most likely i'm gonna end up w/ 2's after free response....so screwed.... arg!!! wasted so much time complaining!!!! must study!!! ahhhh stupid AP books r pulling me in!! help help! :(

wp:comment.wp:comment_content:
AP Physics is a piece of cake~ yummy
Illinois accepts AP scores??
hope yah good luck ... this mia from church .. dont forget me this time.. hehe ......much much luck... takecare

You are the grammar Fuhrer. All bow to your
authority. You will crush all the inferior
people under the soles of your jackboots, and
any who question your motives will be
eliminated. Your punishment is being the bane
of every other person's existence, because
you're constantly contradicting stupidity.
Everyone will be gunning for you. Your dreams
of a master race of spellers and grammarians
frighten the masses. You must always watch your
back. If only your power could be used for good
instead of evil.

item.dc:creator: DanTanDaMan
item.content:encoded:
rereading my naruto manga again i found a quote that i think is sorta true.  Keep in mind i'm not being sexist i'm just saying its often true for about 50 % of the girls

Shikamaru: "I hate women "( i definately don't agree to that part) "They're selfish and annoying...they always act cordial and friendly.  I can never tell when they're getting along or not...Besides, they think that they can boss us guys around..."

like i said i don't agree to all of it, but i think de rest describes a bunch of girls nicely :)

item.dc:creator: DanTanDaMan
item.content:encoded:
lets see wut has happened in my boring life, chess match, first one oh yeah i dropped a queen n made some1 on our team cry oh yeah!!! lets see one of u suckers make a high school student cry due to your stupidity!!!!!!!!! OH YEAH! anyway we eneded up with a draw against West, blah blah blah wutever.

I got literally press ganged into Sobel's group ahhhhh de horror!!! she walked up and asked me if i'm in school Wed and that determinded it, then i saw her paper.  She and the other partner had made notes it read
            "Possible partners Tan, smart but potentially annoying, Andrew, smart but possiblely taken"
i feel so honored

lets see, that was Tues today is Wed, so starts the boring 4 day weekend, things to do, visit Rutgers, go to work, do all the math assignments for the marking period, study for physics test, do physics problems, study for a possible physics retest, complete 3 applications, modify another essay, write a new essay, oh yeah fun things, i think that's the major points.  hmm.... oh yeah add in 50 epds of Gundum Seed and 26 epds of Wolf's Rain to watch, nothing major, just knock out sleep again :) oh yeah fun fun.  oh yeah nighty night, dang long thingee i wrote wuts wrong with me today?!?!

item.dc:creator: DanTanDaMan
item.content:encoded:
doesn't any1 else get yelled at parents to do stuff? i mean where u either do it or they give u all that crap of u being a rouge and being disobeident and your a good for nothing and everything else they can think up to get u to do it?  and don't u hate it how on the end they say oh "thank you for helping out son"?

ITS SERIOUSLY PISSING ME OFF!

oh and those where they give u all this work and then they say "u like it? well get use to it cause that's what your gonna be if you don't make it into college" and then u can literally saying to themselves "and it looks like your not going to make it into college anyway so its good practice for u"

SO DAMN ANNOYING!!!!

Motivate your anger to make them all realize.
Climbing the mountain, never coming down.
Break into the contents, never falling down.

My knee is still shaking, like I was twelve,
Sneaking out of the classroom, by the back door.
A man railed at me twice though, but I didn't care.
Waiting is wasting for people like me.

Don't try to live so wise.
Don't cry 'cause you're so right.
Don't dry with fakes or fears,
'Cause you will hate yourself in the end.

(Repeats)

(TV version doesn't have the rest of the song after that)

You say, "Dreams are dreams.
"I ain't gonna play the fool anymore."
You say, "'Cause I still got my soul."

Take your time, baby, your blood needs slowing down.
Breach your soul to reach yourself before you gloom.
Reflection of fear makes shadows of nothing, shadows of nothing.

You still are blind, if you see a winding road,
'Cause there's always a straight way to the point you see.

Don't try to live so wise.
Don't cry 'cause you're so right.
Don't dry with fakes or fears,
'Cause you will hate yourself in the end.

(Repeats)

item.dc:creator: DanTanDaMan
item.content:encoded:
hehe I was reading a book n I found 3 tactics that I gotta luv

Tactic 1: When asked for information you don't have, try to present the asker with a variable he can define himself

ex. "The new one sir.  Whtat's-his-name?"

Tactic 2: When obliged to participate in a ritual you know nothing about, provide a reason and grab all the sympathy you can

ex. "I-" cough, cough, cough "Why is this man doing his job?? he should be on his deathbed."

Tactic 3 (de one you all will luv): When no other options present themselves....SHOOT EVERYTHING IN SIGHT!!!!

item.dc:creator: DanTanDaMan
item.content:encoded:
I've been searching for a man
All across Japan
Just to find, to find my samurai

Someone who is strong
But still a little shy
Yes I need, I need my samurai

* Ay, Ay, Ay, I'm your little butterfly
Green, black and blue, make the colours in the sky
Ay, Ay, Ay, I'm your little butterfly
Green, black and blue, make the colours in the sky

I've been searching in the woods
And high upon the hills
Just to find, to find my samurai

Someone who won't regret
To keep me in his net
Yes I need, I need my samurai

* Repeat

** Ay, iyaiyai,
Ay, iyaiyai
A-a-a iyaiyai
Where's my samurai
Ay, Ay, Ay, I'm your little butterfly

** Repeat

item.dc:creator: DanTanDaMan
item.content:encoded:
Life's gonna suck when you grow up, when you grow up, when you grow up
Life's gonna suck when you grow up, it sucks pretty bad right now
Hey, if you know the words, sing along
You're gonna have to mow the lawn, do the dishes, make your bed
You're gonna have to go to school until you're seventeen
It's gonna seem about three times as long as that
You might have to go to war, shoot a gun, kill a nun
You might have to go to war when you get out of school
Hey cheer up kids, it gets a lot worse
You're gonna have to deal with stress, deal with stress, deal with stress
You're gonna be a giant mess when you get back from the war
Santa Claus does not exist, and there is no Easter Bunny
You'll find out when you grow up that Big Bird isn't funny
Life's gonna suck when you grow up, when you grow up, when you grow up
Life's gonna suck when you grow up, it sucks pretty bad right now
You're gonna end up smoking crack, on you're back, face the fact
You're gonna end up hooked on smack and then you're gonna die
And then you're gonna die

item.dc:creator: DanTanDaMan
item.content:encoded:
Classic Anime Gag
What's Your Anime Power?
 

Your anime power is the ability to give off one super strong punch when angry. Infact the punch is so strong it sends the buffest of people flying miles into the air. *cough* love hina *cough* Ranma 1/2 *cough*

item.dc:creator: DanTanDaMan
item.content:encoded:
lets see....i've been busy debating philsophy with my spare time, so i've put a lot of thought into it :)

anyway dunno y i started wondering, i think its due to all the love hina, I's, n various anime doing with love flicks i started wondering n comtemplating the will of the universe...or something like that.

Anyway i have reached some whacky conclusions! BEHOLD! MY uhh... conclusions :P

Often the more you hate someone the more u like em. (weird yet true for me but i definately not normal so who knows about u :) )

If you were to take hate n squeeze it super hard u get left with love (not something i thought up but something i read someplace so i felt like putting it up)

i guess being able to trust the person with your deepest darkest secret definately puts your buddy up high on your list.

A sign of true friendship, to be able to get into a massive fight with them which includes nonstop name-calling, cursing at each other for long hours, causing major injuries upon each other n still be good friends.

The more someone complains about you the more the person admires you.

and finally 2 random quotes:

Every statement I tell you is a lie, every question I ask u is a trick, you will find no truth in me

"Tell me where you are so I can kill you"
-Heather Cheung

item.dc:creator: DanTanDaMan
item.content:encoded:
u know, i think something is seriously wrong with me...

HOLD! i mean other than my usal annoying n craziness self, listen me out n you'll understand

I'M MISSING SCHOOL! i'm dying of boredom even with lots of anime, computer games, and a job.  WUT THE HELL IS WRONG WITH ME?! 

i came to de conclusion that its due to a lack of social contact, scary n i considered myself anti-social, but apparently that's y.  so plz ease my boredom n help me drop me an IM at

AIM: DanTanDaMan
YM: ssj_gerread

item.dc:creator: DanTanDaMan
item.content:encoded:
well i back n dropping in info n such for all u ppl.  First off I started driving.  I got my permit now, SO GET OFF THE ROAD U MORONS!  I DRIVING! :P.

i got my SAT II MATH IC back.  i got a 770, i know i should be happy but for some reason i not satisfied, i think i hung around with TIM too much.

Summer is boring, i getting bored to death at my comp games so i gonna have to take extreme measures soon.

For some reason a ton of ppl aren't talking to me dunno y.

hmm... last off, any1! plz any! IM me on AIM.  SN: tiger86j8 i'm sooooo bored

German i dunno.

Now after that i started clowning around at home i having a ton of noosebleeds so it ain't fun.  Also i still job hunting wish me luck peeps.

item.dc:creator: DanTanDaMan
item.content:encoded:
whoah i totally forgot to post!

well lets see, i took the SAT IIs Math IC on Sat, that was borederline of pure stupidity on some of the questions though. 

Like de question goes u got a penny, a nickel, n a dime in a box.  If u pick 2 coins out at random, without replacing the coins, wut is the chance of u drawing a sum of 8 cents.  DUH!!! lemme think could de answer be 0?! hehe gotta wonder of de SAT II MAth IC IQ after that question.

lets see school ends next Wed which means i got that long till i get dragged to parents office :(. 

anyway gotta cram for a bunch of finals enjoy u peeps!
